description: This lovely circular route takes you along the Riverside Walk in Churchill Gardens in Salisbury. The gardens are located at the southern side of the town just south east of the famous cathedral. In the park you can follow footpaths along the River Avon at the southern and eastern side. There are also paths suitable for cycling and there is a parkrun on Saturday mornings too. To continue your walking in the area you could try the longer Salisbury Circular Walk . For more riverside walking in the area try the Pewsey Avon Trail . This long distance walk starts in Salisbury and runs all the way to Pewsey along the River Avon.
